sentences.english: Our staff will help you in every way possible .
sentences.chinese: 我们的员工会尽力帮助你。

sentences.english: Even if it were technically possible , we do not have the money to do it.
sentences.chinese: 即使技术上可行，我们也没有钱去做。

sentences.english: She decided to stay as far away from him as was humanly possible .
sentences.chinese: 她决定尽可能离他远点。

detailed_translations.english: if something is possible, it can be done or achieved

sentences.english: He’s never been to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他从未去过澳大利亚。

sentences.english: I’m never going back there again, not as long as I live.
sentences.chinese: 只要我活着，我再也不会回到那儿去。

sentences.english: It is never too late to give up smoking.
sentences.chinese: 戒烟不言晚。

sentences.english: (= never after a particular time ) would he return to Naples.
sentences.chinese: 他再也不会回到那不勒斯。

detailed_translations.english: not at any time, or not once

name: future
trans: n. 未来；前途；期货；将来时

sentences.english: What are your plans for the future?
sentences.chinese: 你未来有什么打算？

sentences.english: The islands should have the right to decide their own future.
sentences.chinese: 这些岛屿应当有权决定自己的未来。

sentences.english: a leader who will shape the organization’s future
sentences.chinese: 将决定该组织未来的一位领导者

detailed_translations.english: the time after the present

name: terrible
trans: adj. 可怕的；很糟的；令人讨厌的

sentences.english: The hotel was absolutely terrible.
sentences.chinese: 这家宾馆糟糕透了。

sentences.english: I’d better write this down; I have a terrible memory.
sentences.chinese: 我最好把它记下来，我的记性很差。

sentences.english: You’re making a terrible mistake.
sentences.chinese: 你犯了一个极大的错误。

detailed_translations.english: very bad

name: happen
trans: vi. 发生；碰巧；偶然遇到

sentences.english: When did the accident happen?
sentences.chinese: 事故什么时候发生的？

sentences.english: It’s impossible to predict what will happen next.
sentences.chinese: 不可能预测接下来会发生什么。

sentences.english: She carried on as if nothing had happened.
sentences.chinese: 她继续干，似乎什么都未曾发生。

sentences.english: This was bound to happen sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 这事注定早晚会发生。

sentences.english: This kind of thing happens all the time.
sentences.chinese: 这种事一直在发生。

sentences.english: As it happens, I know someone who might be able to help.
sentences.chinese: 真巧，我正好认识一个人，这个人也许帮得上忙。

sentences.english: We happened to discover we had a friend in common.
sentences.chinese: 我们碰巧发现我们有个共同的朋友。

detailed_translations.english: when something happens, there is an event, especially one that is not planned

name: lose
trans: vt. 浪费；使沉溺于；使迷路；遗失；错过

sentences.english: I’ve lost my appetite.
sentences.chinese: 我已经没有了胃口。

sentences.english: Try not to lose heart (= become sad and hopeless ) - there are plenty of other jobs.
sentences.chinese: 不要灰心―还有很多其他的工作。

sentences.english: By the time the ambulance arrived, Douglas had lost consciousness .
sentences.chinese: 救护车赶到时，道格拉斯已经失去知觉。

sentences.english: I followed her on foot, but lost her in the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 我走在她后面，可是在人群中跟丢了。

sentences.english: Klinger lost his seat in the election.
sentences.chinese: 克林格在选举中失去了他的席位。

detailed_translations.english: to stop having a particular attitude, quality, ability etc, or to gradually have less of it

name: fire
trans: n. 火；火灾；炮火；炉火；热情；激情；磨难
vt. 点燃；解雇；开除；使发光；烧制；激动；放枪
vi. 着火；射击；开枪；激动；烧火

sentences.english: The warehouse was completely destroyed by fire.
sentences.chinese: 仓库全给烧毁了。

sentences.english: Thirty people died in a fire in downtown Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 30人死于芝加哥市中心的一场火灾。

sentences.english: Police think that the fire was started deliberately.
sentences.chinese: 警方认为有人故意纵火。

sentences.english: Rioters set fire to a whole row of stores (= made them start burning ) .
sentences.chinese: 暴徒纵火焚烧了一整排商店。

sentences.english: Soldiers fired on the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 士兵朝人群开枪。

detailed_translations.english: uncontrolled flames, light, and heat that destroy and damage things
to shoot bullets or bombs

name: raise
trans: vt. 提高；筹集；养育；升起

sentences.english: He did not raise the subject again.
sentences.chinese: 他再也没有提起这个话题。

sentences.english: I’d like to raise the issue of publicity.
sentences.chinese: 我想提一提宣传问题。

sentences.english: Betty raised the important question of who will be in charge.
sentences.chinese: 贝蒂提出了一个重要问题，就是将由谁来负责。

detailed_translations.english: to begin to talk or write about a subject that you want to be considered or a question that you think should be answered

sentences.english: In this month’s competition you could win a prize worth £3,000.
sentences.chinese: 在本月的竞赛中您可以赢得价值3,000英镑的奖品。

sentences.english: The first prize has gone to Dr John Gentle.
sentences.chinese: 获得一等奖的是约翰·金特尔博士。

sentences.english: The prizes are awarded (= given ) every year to students who have shown original thinking in their work.
sentences.chinese: 这些奖项每年颁发给在学习中表现出创造性思维的学生。

sentences.english: The total prize money was £30,000.
sentences.chinese: 奖金总额为3万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: something that is given to someone who is successful in a competition, race, game of chance etc
to think that someone or something is very important or valuable
good enough to win a prize or having won a prize

name: video
trans: n. [电子] 视频；录像，录像机；电视
adj. 视频的；录像的；电视的

sentences.english: video production
sentences.chinese: 录像制作

sentences.english: video materials for language teaching
sentences.chinese: 语言教学的影像素材

detailed_translations.english: relating to or used in the process of recording and showing pictures on television
a copy of a film or television programme, or a series of events, recorded on videotape

sentences.english: Cut off a piece of wood 5 cm in length.
sentences.chinese: 截下一段五厘米长的木头。

sentences.english: His trousers were held up with a piece of string.
sentences.chinese: 他的裤子靠一根细绳系着。

sentences.english: Would you like a small or a large piece?
sentences.chinese: 你想要一小块还是一大块？

sentences.english: Chop the potato into bite-sized pieces.
sentences.chinese: 把马铃薯切成小块。

sentences.english: The shower head just came to pieces (= broke into separate parts ) in my hand.
sentences.chinese: 花洒就在我手中裂开了。

sentences.english: to piece together a jigsaw
sentences.chinese: 拼合拼图

detailed_translations.english: an amount of something that has been separated from the main part
to put all the separate parts of sth together to make a complete whole

name: visitor
trans: n. 访问者，参观者；视察者；候鸟

sentences.english: Times Square attracts more than 30 million visitors annually.
sentences.chinese: 时代广场每年吸引三千多万游客。

detailed_translations.chinese: 访问者，参观者；视察者；候鸟
detailed_translations.english: someone who comes to visit a place or a person

sentences.english: She taught me fractions and counting.
sentences.chinese: 他教我分数和计算。

detailed_translations.english: to give lessons in a school, college, or university, or to help someone learn about something by giving them information

sentences.english: I’m sorry. That’s quite impossible.
sentences.chinese: 我很抱歉，那是完全不可能的。

sentences.english: I felt quite bitter about it at the time.
sentences.chinese: 当时我对此感到相当痛苦。

sentences.english: Well, actually it requires quite a bit of work and research.
sentences.chinese: 呃，实际上这需要相当多的工作和研究。

sentences.english: I can see it quite clearly.
sentences.chinese: 我能清清楚楚地看见它。

detailed_translations.english: completely

name: nervous
trans: adj. 神经的；紧张不安的；强健有力的

sentences.english: I wish you’d stop looking at me like that. You’re making me nervous.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你不要再那样看着我了，你让我紧张。

sentences.english: By the time I got into the interview I was a nervous wreck (= was extremely nervous ).
sentences.chinese: 到了面试的时候，我紧张得要命。

detailed_translations.english: worried or frightened about something, and unable to relax

sentences.english: The bed wasn’t particularly comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 这床不大舒服。

detailed_translations.english: making you feel physically relaxed, without any pain or without being too hot, cold etc

name: relaxed
trans: v. relax的过去式和过去分词
adj. 松懈的，放松的；悠闲的，自在的；不严格的，不拘束的

sentences.english: Thank you for your advice; it’s been very helpful.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你的建议，它非常有用。

sentences.english: It is helpful if we address a few key questions here.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们在这里解决一些关键问题会很有用的。

detailed_translations.english: providing useful help in making a situation better or easier

sentences.english: Everyone is free to engage in peaceful political activity.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都可以自由参加和平的政治活动。

sentences.english: fund-raising activities
sentences.chinese: 筹款活动

sentences.english: Regular physical activity helps to control your weight.
sentences.chinese: 定期参加体育活动有助于控制体重。

detailed_translations.english: things that people do, especially in order to achieve a particular aim

sentences.english: I like playing beach volleyball.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢打沙滩排球。

sentences.english: Every sunday, they played volleyball in the park.
sentences.chinese: 每个周日他们在公园打排球。

sentences.english: Balloon, baseball, basketball, football and volleyball all dance  ballet on the  volcano.
sentences.chinese: 气球、棒球、篮球、足球和排球都在火山上跳芭蕾舞。

detailed_translations.english: a game in which two teams use their hands to hit a ball over a high net

sentences.english: religious beliefs and practices
sentences.chinese: 宗教信仰和习俗

sentences.english: dangerous working practices
sentences.chinese: 危险的工作方法

detailed_translations.english: something that people do often, especially a particular way of doing something or a social or religious custom

sentences.english: They meet fairly often to play chess .
sentences.chinese: 他们经常在一起下国际象棋。

detailed_translations.english: a game for two players, who move their playing pieces according to particular rules across a special board to try to trap their opponent’s king

name: club
trans: n. 俱乐部，社团；夜总会；棍棒；（扑克牌中的）梅花

sentences.english: Manchester United Football Club
sentences.chinese: 曼联（队）足球俱乐部

sentences.english: Shall we go to a club?
sentences.chinese: 我们去夜总会怎样？

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔职业体育的〕俱乐部；俱乐部；夜总会
detailed_translations.english: a professional organization including the players, managers, and owners of a sports team

sentences.english: Most of the relief work was done by volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 大部分救援工作都由志愿人员完成。

sentences.english: I volunteered my services as a driver.
sentences.chinese: 我主动提出来当司机。

detailed_translations.english: someone who does a job willingly without being paid
to offer to do something without expecting any reward, often something that other people do not want to do

sentences.english: Vera won £20 at bingo.
sentences.chinese: 薇拉玩宾戈赢了20英镑。

detailed_translations.english: a game played for money or prizes, in which numbers are chosen by chance and called out, and if you have the right numbers on your card, you win

sentences.english: Both Helen’s parents are doctors.
sentences.chinese: 海伦的父母都是医生。

detailed_translations.english: used to talk about two people, things etc together, and emphasize that each is included

name: nothing
trans: n. 无；零；不关紧要之事

sentences.english: Nothing ever happens in this town.
sentences.chinese: 这镇上从来都不会发生什么特别的事。

sentences.english: There’s nothing in this box.
sentences.chinese: 这盒子里什么也没有。

sentences.english: There was nothing else the doctors could do.
sentences.chinese: 医生们没有别的办法了。

sentences.english: He had nothing more to say.
sentences.chinese: 他没有更多要说的了。

sentences.english: We know nothing about her family.
sentences.chinese: 我们对她的家庭一无所知。

sentences.english: I couldn’t just stand by and do nothing.
sentences.chinese: 我不能就那样袖手旁观。

sentences.english: I promised to say nothing about it to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 我答应这件事对谁也不说。

sentences.english: We’ve heard nothing from her for weeks.
sentences.chinese: 我们好几个星期没有她的音信了。

sentences.english: There’s absolutely nothing to be ashamed of.
sentences.chinese: 根本没有什么好难为情的。

sentences.english: ‘Do you know much about business?’ ‘Nothing at all.’
sentences.chinese: “你对做生意了解得多吗？”“一窍不通。”

sentences.english: She had eaten virtually nothing at supper.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭她几乎什么也没吃。

sentences.english: There’s nothing wrong with the data.
sentences.chinese: 这些数据没什么差错。

sentences.english: There’s nothing new about this.
sentences.chinese: 这没有什么新鲜的。

sentences.english: A brief search was made but they found nothing untoward.
sentences.chinese: 他们简单地搜查了一番，没发现任何异常。

sentences.english: She’s nothing like her brother.
sentences.chinese: 她一点都不像她的哥哥。

detailed_translations.english: not anything or no thing
to have no qualities or features that are similar to someone or something else

sentences.english: Many sacrificed their weekend to join the hunt for the missing girl.
sentences.chinese: 许多人牺牲周末时间，加入了寻找失踪女孩的行动。

sentences.english: the benefits of joining our pension scheme
sentences.chinese: 参加我们的退休金计划的好处

sentences.english: Church leaders have joined the campaign to end foxhunting.
sentences.chinese: 教会领袖参与了禁止猎狐的运动。

sentences.english: Join the two pieces of wood with strong glue.
sentences.chinese: 用强力胶水把两块木头黏合起来。

detailed_translations.english: to begin to take part in an activity that other people are involved in

name: improve
trans: vt. 改善，增进；提高…的价值

sentences.english: a course for students wishing to improve their English
sentences.chinese: 为想提高英语水平的学生开设的一门课

sentences.english: The doctors say she is improving (= after being ill ).
sentences.chinese: 医生说她正在康复。

sentences.english: You could use the money for improving your home.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用这笔钱改善家居。

sentences.english: Many wines improve with age (= get better as they get older ).
sentences.chinese: 很多葡萄酒年代越久越香醇。

detailed_translations.english: to make something better, or to become better
to make something better, or to become better

name: thinking
trans: n. 思考；思想；想法；意见；见解
adj. 思考的；思想的；有理性的；好思考的

sentences.english: the thinking man’s pop band
sentences.chinese: 有思想的男士喜欢的流行乐队

detailed_translations.english: a thinking person is intelligent and tries to think carefully about important subjects
your opinion or ideas about something, or your attitude towards it

name: skill
trans: n. 技能，技巧；本领，技术

sentences.english: Reading and writing are two different skills.
sentences.chinese: 阅读和写作是两种不同的技能。

sentences.english: Many jobs today require computer skills.
sentences.chinese: 如今的许多工作都需要计算机技能。

detailed_translations.english: an ability to do something well, especially because you have learned and practised it

sentences.english: They threw down the challenge that he couldn’t wash 40 cars in one hour (= invited him to try to do it ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们激将他，说他不可能在1小时内擦洗40辆汽车。

detailed_translations.chinese: 挑战，邀请比赛；艰巨的任务；怀疑，质问
detailed_translations.english: something that tests strength, skill, or ability, especially in a way that is interesting

detailed_translations.chinese: 反对， 公然反抗； 向…挑战； 对…质疑
detailed_translations.english: to refuse to accept that something is right, fair, or legal

name: meeting
trans: n. 会议；会见；集会；汇合点

sentences.english: We’re having a meeting next week to discuss the matter.
sentences.chinese: 我们下周将开会讨论此事。

sentences.english: I had felt drawn to Alice ever since our first meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我第一次见到艾丽斯就感觉被她吸引住了

detailed_translations.english: an event at which people meet to discuss and decide things

name: act
trans: n. 行为，行动；法令，法案；（戏剧，歌剧的）一幕，段；装腔作势
vi. 行动；扮演，充当；表现，举止；假装，演戏；起作用，见效

sentences.english: The company acted correctly in sacking him.
sentences.chinese: 公司解雇他做得对。

sentences.english: The jury decided that Walker had acted in self-defence.
sentences.chinese: 陪审团裁定沃克的行为属于自卫。

sentences.english: Politicians will only act when enough people demand that they do something.
sentences.chinese: 只有足够多的民众起来要求，政客们才会采取行动。

sentences.english: The padding acts as a cushion if the player falls or is hit by the ball.
sentences.chinese: 万一球员摔倒或者被球击中，衬垫可以起到缓冲作用。

sentences.english: The new president’s first act should be to end the war.
sentences.chinese: 新总统的第一步行动应当是结束战争。

detailed_translations.english: to do something in a particular way or for a particular reason
one thing that you do

name: useful
trans: adj. 有用的，有益的；有帮助的

sentences.english: useful information
sentences.chinese: 有用的信息

sentences.english: A little Japanese can be really useful.
sentences.chinese: 懂一点日语非常有用。

sentences.english: Can you come and make yourself useful(= help people to do something )?
sentences.chinese: 你能不能过来帮点忙？

detailed_translations.chinese: 有用的，有益的；有帮助的
detailed_translations.english: helping you to do or get what you want

sentences.english: She has just landed the lead role in their latest production.
sentences.chinese: 她刚在他们最新的作品中取得了主角。

detailed_translations.english: the character played by an actor in a play or film

sentences.english: black trousers teamed with a bright shirt
sentences.chinese: 配亮色衬衫的黑裤子

sentences.english: You can team up with one other class member if you want.
sentences.chinese: 例句：如果你愿意的话，可以找一个同学组成一组。

detailed_translations.english: to put two things or people together, because they will look good or work well together

name: shape
trans: n. 形状；模型；身材；具体化
vt. 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合

sentences.english: What shape is the table?
sentences.chinese: 那张桌子是什么形状的？

sentences.english: You can recognize a tree by the shape of its leaves.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据树叶的形状辨认出是什么树。

sentences.english: His battered old hat had completely lost its shape.
sentences.chinese: 他那顶破旧的帽子已经完全变形了。

sentences.english: The plants grow in every shape and size .
sentences.chinese: 这些植物有各种形状，各种大小。

sentences.english: The children cut out shapes (= squares, triangles etc ) from the piece of cardboard.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们把卡纸片剪成各种形状。

detailed_translations.english: the form that something has, for example round, square,  triangular  etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合
detailed_translations.english: to influence something such as a belief, opinion etc and make it develop in a particular way

name: level
trans: adj. 水平的；平坦的；同高的
vi. 瞄准；拉平；变得平坦

sentences.english: Your arms should be at the same level as your desk.
sentences.chinese: 手臂应该与桌子齐平。

sentences.english: The floors in the old house were not completely level.
sentences.chinese: 老房子的地面不是完全平整的。

detailed_translations.english: the height of something in relation to the ground or to another object
flat and not sloping in any direction

name: pool
trans: n. 联营；撞球；水塘；共同资金

sentences.english: They have a nice pool in their backyard.
sentences.chinese: 他们后院有个漂亮的游泳池。

sentences.english: a shallow pool suitable for children
sentences.chinese: 适合儿童的浅水池

sentences.english: pools of water with tiny fish in them
sentences.chinese: 有小鱼的一个个水池

detailed_translations.english: a hole or container that has been specially made and filled with water so that people can swim or play in it

name: type
trans: n. 类型，品种；模范；样式
vt. 打字；测定（血等）类型

sentences.english: I’ve already seen a few movies of this type.
sentences.chinese: 我已经看过几部这种类型的影片了。

sentences.english: He types with two fingers.
sentences.chinese: 他用两个手指打字。

detailed_translations.english: one member of a group of people or things that have similar features or qualities
to write something using a computer or a typewriter

name: following
trans: n. 下列事物；一批追随者
adj. 下面的；其次的，接着的

sentences.english: He was sick in the evening, but the following day he was better.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上他生病了，但第二天就好一些了。

sentences.english: Write down the following information: name of product, type, date purchased and price.
sentences.chinese: 写下以下信息：产品名称、型号、购买日期和价格。

detailed_translations.english: the next afternoon, month etc

name: which
trans: pron. 哪/那一个；哪/那一些

sentences.english: Which book are you looking for?
sentences.chinese: 你在找哪本书？

sentences.english: Which are the most important crops?
sentences.chinese: 哪些农作物是最重要的？

sentences.english: Miranda was sure it was one of them, but was not sure which.
sentences.chinese: 米兰达确定此人是他们其中的一个，但不能肯定是哪一个。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about one or more members of a group of people or things, when you are uncertain about it or about them

name: circle
trans: n. 循环，周期；圆；圈子；圆形物

sentences.english: Draw a circle 10cm in diameter.
sentences.chinese: 画一个直径10厘米的圆形。

sentences.english: Johnson was part of the President’s inner circle (= the people who have the most influence ) .
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊是总统核心集团的人。

sentences.english: Sooner or later, fashion comes full circle.
sentences.chinese: 时尚迟早会流行回来的。

sentences.english: This is the road that circles the city.
sentences.chinese: 这就是那条环城路。

detailed_translations.english: a completely round shape, like the letter O
to move in the shape of a circle around something, especially in the air

name: add
trans: vi. 加；增加；加起来；做加法
vt. 增加，添加；补充说；计算…总和

sentences.english: If the mixture seems dry, add water.
sentences.chinese: 如果混合物看上去干，加点水。

detailed_translations.english: to put something with something else or with a group of other things

name: score
trans: n. 分数；二十；配乐；刻痕
vt. 获得；评价；划线，刻划；把…记下

sentences.english: At half-time the score was one all.
sentences.chinese: 半场时的比分是一比一。

sentences.english: What’s the score?
sentences.chinese: 比分是多少？

sentences.english: Is anybody keeping score (= making a record of the score ) ?
sentences.chinese: 有没有人负责记分？

sentences.english: The final score was Southampton two, Leeds United nil.
sentences.chinese: 最后的比分是二比零，南安普敦队击败利兹联队。

sentences.english: The school’s test scores have not improved.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的考试成绩没有提高。

detailed_translations.english: the number of points that each team or player has won in a game or competition

name: relax
trans: vi. 放松，休息；松懈，松弛；变从容；休养
vt. 放松；使休息；使松弛；缓和；使松懈

sentences.english: Gentle exercise can relax stiff shoulder muscles.
sentences.chinese: 和缓的运动可以使僵硬的肩部肌肉放松。

detailed_translations.english: if you relax a part of your body or it relaxes, it becomes less stiff or less tight
to rest or do something that is enjoyable, especially after you have been working

name: free
trans: adj. 免费的；自由的，不受约束的；[化学] 游离的

sentences.english: He knew he could be free in as little as three years.
sentences.chinese: 他知道只要再过三年他就能自由了。

sentences.english: With one leap he was free!
sentences.chinese: 这一跳他就自由了！

sentences.english: He walked out of the courtroom a free man .
sentences.chinese: 他从法庭走出来，成了自由人。

sentences.english: They have called on the government to set all political prisoners free .
sentences.chinese: 他们呼吁政府释放所有政治犯。

sentences.english: He was found not guilty and walked free from the court.
sentences.chinese: 他被判无罪，当庭释放。

sentences.english: The animals are allowed to run free in the park.
sentences.chinese: 那些动物可以在公园里自由奔跑。

sentences.english: I’m free next weekend.
sentences.chinese: 下个周末我有空。

detailed_translations.english: not held, tied up, or kept somewhere as a prisoner

name: mind
trans: n. 理智，精神；意见；智力；记忆力

sentences.english: It is impossible to understand the complex nature of the human mind.
sentences.chinese: 要想了解人类思维复杂的特性是不可能的。

sentences.english: Mind and body are closely related.
sentences.chinese: 思想和肉体紧密相连。

sentences.english: Meditation involves focusing the mind on a single object or word.
sentences.chinese: 冥想需要把思想集中在一个物体或单词上。

sentences.english: Sorry─your name has gone right out of my mind.
sentences.chinese: 对不起——我完全想不起你的名字了。

detailed_translations.english: your thoughts or your ability to think, feel, and imagine things

name: active
trans: n. 主动语态；积极分子
adj. 积极的；活跃的；主动的；有效的；现役的

sentences.english: games for active youngsters
sentences.chinese: 活跃好动的年轻人玩的游戏

sentences.english: She’s over 80, but is still very active.
sentences.chinese: 她80多岁了，但仍旧很活跃。

sentences.english: He became politically active at college.
sentences.chinese: 他上大学时开始积极参与政治活动。

detailed_translations.english: always busy doing things, especially physical or mental activities

name: quietly
trans: adv. 安静地；秘密地；平稳地

sentences.english: Rosa shut the door quietly.
sentences.chinese: 罗莎悄悄关上门。

sentences.english: ‘I’m sorry,’ she said quietly.
sentences.chinese: “对不起。”她轻声说道。

sentences.english: a quietly-spoken man (= one who always speaks quietly )
sentences.chinese: 说话轻柔的男人

detailed_translations.english: without making much noise

name: must
trans: aux. 必须，一定；可以，应当；很可能
n. 绝对必要的事物；未发酵葡萄汁

sentences.english: All passengers must wear seat belts.
sentences.chinese: 所有乘客都必须系安全带。

sentences.english: It’s getting late. I really must go.
sentences.chinese: 天晚了，我真的必须走了。

sentences.english: You must work hard.
sentences.chinese: 你必须努力工作。

sentences.english: We must all be patient.
sentences.chinese: 我们都必须耐心。

sentences.english: Must I pay now?
sentences.chinese: 我必须现在付款吗？

sentences.english: For the engine to work, the green lever must be in the ‘up’ position.
sentences.chinese: 要启动引擎，绿色操纵杆必须在“上”这一挡。

sentences.english: Accidents must be reported to the safety officer.
sentences.chinese: 出了事故必须向安全员报告。

detailed_translations.english: to have to do something because it is necessary or important, or because of a law or order

name: without
trans: adv. 户外；在外面；没有或不显示某事物

sentences.english: After the storm we were without electricity for five days.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨之后我们断电了五天。

sentences.english: a house without a garden
sentences.chinese: 不带花园的房子

sentences.english: We passed two ruined abbeys, one with a tower and one without.
sentences.chinese: 我们路过两座破落的寺院，一座有塔楼，另一座没有。

sentences.english: I’m getting used to managing without a car.
sentences.chinese: 我已经习惯没有汽车了。

detailed_translations.english: not having something, especially something that is basic or necessary

detailed_translations.chinese: 户外；在外面；没有或不显示某事物

name: bored
trans: v. 使厌烦（bore的过去式）；烦扰
adj. 无聊的；无趣的；烦人的

sentences.english: He was easily bored.
sentences.chinese: 他很容易感到厌烦。

sentences.english: After a while, I got bored and left.
sentences.chinese: 过了一会儿，我觉得无聊，就走了。

detailed_translations.english: tired and impatient because you do not think something is interesting, or because you have nothing to do

name: example
trans: vt. 作为…的例子；为…做出榜样

sentences.english: Many countries, for example Mexico and Japan, have a lot of earthquakes.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家，例如墨西哥和日本，经常发生地震。

sentences.english: Her courage is an example to us all.
sentences.chinese: 她的勇气是我们大家的榜样。

detailed_translations.english: something such as an object, a fact or a situation that shows, explains or supports what you say

name: hurry
trans: v. 仓促（做某事）；催促；（朝某方向）迅速移动；迅速处理

sentences.english: If we hurry, we’ll get there in time.
sentences.chinese: 要是赶紧的话，我们能及时到那里。

sentences.english: I hate having to hurry a meal.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌匆匆忙忙地吃饭。

sentences.english: We’ll have to hurry, otherwise we’ll miss the start.
sentences.chinese: 我们得赶紧，否则就会错过开头部分了。

sentences.english: There’s no need to hurry. We’ve got plenty of time.
sentences.chinese: 不必匆忙，我们有的是时间。

detailed_translations.english: to do something or go somewhere more quickly than usual, especially because there is not much time
to make someone do something more quickly

sentences.english: My wallet must be around here somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 我的钱包肯定是在这里的什么地方。

sentences.english: We could meet for dinner at Giorgio’s or somewhere (= or a similar place ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在乔治家或别的什么地方一起吃饭。

detailed_translations.english: in or to a place, but you do not say or know exactly where

sentences.english: I’ve known Barbara for years. Since we were babies, actually.
sentences.chinese: 我认识芭芭拉很多年了，实际上我们从小就认识。

sentences.english: Actually, on second thoughts, I don’t think I want to go out tonight.
sentences.chinese: 其实再想想，我今晚不打算出去了。

detailed_translations.english: used to add new information to what you have just said, to give your opinion, or to start a new conversation

sentences.english: He did the cooking, cleaning, laundry, and home repairs.
sentences.chinese: 他做饭、打扫卫生、洗衣服，还在家修修补补。

detailed_translations.english: Cooking is the activity of preparing food

sentences.english: I'm going to buy a surfboard and learn to surf.
sentences.chinese: 我要去买个冲浪板来学冲浪。

detailed_translations.english: to ride on waves while standing on a special board

sentences.english: Do you have access to the Internet?
sentences.chinese: 你上得了网吗？

detailed_translations.english: a computer system that allows millions of computer users around the world to exchange information

sentences.english: Men are doing more housework nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 现今男人正在承担越来越多的家务。

detailed_translations.english: work that you do to take care of a house, for example washing, cleaning etc

sentences.english: Much of his work is done by phone .
sentences.chinese: 他的工作大部分是通过电话进行的。

sentences.english: Who was that on the phone ?
sentences.chinese: 谁来的电话？

sentences.english: I wish Amy would get off the phone .
sentences.chinese: 我真希望埃米别再打电话了。

detailed_translations.english: a telephone

name: bookworm
trans: n. 书呆子；蠹鱼，蛀书虫

sentences.english: You can buy anything you want.
sentences.chinese: 你想要什么都可以买。

sentences.english: He was prepared to do anything to make a bit of money.
sentences.chinese: 只要能赚一点钱，他什么都愿意做。

sentences.english: Anything would be better than staying at home!
sentences.chinese: 做什么都比待在家里好！

sentences.english: You can write about swimming, skiing, or anything else you enjoy doing.
sentences.chinese: 你可以写游泳、写滑雪或者其他任何你喜欢的活动。

detailed_translations.english: any thing, event, situation etc, when it is not important to say exactly which

sentences.english: They run a small grocery store.
sentences.chinese: 他们经营一家小食品杂货店。

detailed_translations.english: food and other goods that are sold by a grocer or a supermarket

sentences.english: the most expensive restaurant in town
sentences.chinese: 城里最贵的餐馆

sentences.english: Petrol is becoming more and more expensive.
sentences.chinese: 汽油越来越贵了。

sentences.english: Photography is an expensive hobby.
sentences.chinese: 摄影是一项很花钱的业余爱好。

sentences.english: For low-income families, children’s safety equipment can be prohibitively expensive (= so expensive that most people cannot afford it ).
sentences.chinese: 对于低收入家庭来说，儿童的安全设备贵得让人望而却步。

sentences.english: Employing the wrong builder can be a horribly expensive mistake.
sentences.chinese: 用错建筑工人有时会是代价高昂的错误。

sentences.english: Her husband had expensive tastes (= liked expensive things ).
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫喜欢的东西都很贵。

detailed_translations.english: costing a lot of money

name: yummy
trans: n. 美味的东西；令人喜爱的东西
adj. 好吃的；美味的；愉快的

sentences.english: Spread low-fat cream cheese on a whole-wheat bagel (or English muffin) and then top with sliced tomatoes for a yummy sandwich.
sentences.chinese: 低脂全麦面包圈（或英式松饼）脂肪奶酪，然后用美味的三明治切片西红柿涂在上面。

sentences.english: Make something yummy, like popcorn or a cup of special herb tea, to make reading time something your daughter looks forward to.
sentences.chinese: 做些美味的食品，比如说爆米花或一杯特别的香草茶，使你女儿更加期待阅读时光。

sentences.english: So quite quickly you can use your intelligence to change your perception of yummy bread to toxic sludge.
sentences.chinese: 因此，你可以用你的聪明才智修改你对美味的面包印象，把它设为一团有毒污泥吧。

sentences.english: Everybody knows Tom.
sentences.chinese: 人人都认识汤姆。

detailed_translations.english: everyone

name: foreign
trans: adj. 外国的；外交的；异质的；不相关的

sentences.english: foreign students
sentences.chinese: 外国学生

sentences.english: Can you speak any foreign languages?
sentences.chinese: 你会讲外语吗？

detailed_translations.english: from or relating to a country that is not your own

sentences.english: By the time she was eight, she could read Greek and Latin.
sentences.chinese: 她八岁时就会读希腊文和拉丁文了。

detailed_translations.english: used as the past tense of ‘can’ to say what someone was able to do or was allowed to do in the past

sentences.english: The audiences stamped loudly to express their grievances.
sentences.chinese: 听众大声地踏脚以表达他们的不满。

name: understand
trans: vt. 理解；懂；获悉；推断；省略

sentences.english: She doesn’t understand English.
sentences.chinese: 她不懂英语。

sentences.english: I’m sorry, I don’t understand. Can yon explain that again?
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我不明白。你能再解释一遍吗？

sentences.english: The woman had a strong accent, and I couldn’t understand what she was saying.
sentences.chinese: 那女人口音很重，我听不懂她在说些什么。

detailed_translations.english: to know the meaning of what someone is telling you, or the language that they speak

name: understood
trans: v. 明白；懂得（understand的过去分词）；熟悉
adj. 被充分理解的；心照不宣的

name: understood
trans: v. 明白；懂得（understand的过去分词）；熟悉
adj. 被充分理解的；心照不宣的

name: cartoon
trans: n. 卡通片，[电影] 动画片；连环漫画

sentences.english: a Walt Disney cartoon
sentences.chinese: 迪斯尼动画片

sentences.english: ...one of Britain's best-loved cartoon characters, Rupert the Bear.
sentences.chinese: 英国最受欢迎的漫画形象之一——鲁珀特熊

detailed_translations.english: a short film that is made by photographing a series of drawings

sentences.english: What about the Canadian policy?
sentences.chinese: 那么加拿大的政策呢？

sentences.english: The fugitive is believed to be headed for the Canadian border.
sentences.chinese: 据信，逃亡者正向加拿大边界方向逃窜。

sentences.english: Most English people bracket American and Canadian accents together.
sentences.chinese: 大多数英国人都把美国音和加拿大音相提并论。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Canada or its people
someone from Canada

sentences.english: This program is beamed at Russia.
sentences.chinese: 这套节目是对俄罗斯广播的。

sentences.english: That transmitter was beamed at Russia.
sentences.chinese: 那台发射机曾用于对俄罗斯广播。

sentences.english: He was doubling for America and Russia.
sentences.chinese: 他给美国和俄罗斯当双重间谍。

name: reply
trans: vi. 回答；[法] 答辩；回击

sentences.english: I asked Clive where he was going, but he didn’t reply.
sentences.chinese: 我问克莱夫到哪儿去，但他没有回答。

sentences.english: Sorry it took me so long to reply.
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，我过了这么久才回复。

sentences.english: ‘Did you see Simon today?’ ‘Of course,’ Nathalie replied with a smile.
sentences.chinese: “你今天见到西蒙了吗？”“当然啦。”纳萨莉笑着答道。

sentences.english: I tried calling, but there was no reply.
sentences.chinese: 我试着打电话去，但没有人接。

detailed_translations.english: to answer someone by saying or writing something
something that is said, written, or done as a way of replying

sentences.english: Going to trade fairs is an ideal opportunity to size up the competition .
sentences.chinese: 参加商品交易会是估量竞争规模的理想机会。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people or organizations try to be more successful than other people or organizations

name: proud
trans: adj. 自豪的；得意的；自负的

sentences.english: a proud man who would not admit his mistakes
sentences.chinese: 自以为是、不愿认错的男子

sentences.english: Seth was the proud owner of a new sports car.
sentences.chinese: 赛思因为有了新跑车而扬扬得意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 骄傲的；自负的〔含贬义〕；自豪的
detailed_translations.english: thinking that you are more important, skilful etc than you really are – used to show disapproval

sentences.english: How dared they do such a thing?
sentences.chinese: 他们怎么敢做出这样的事?

sentences.english: He would not succumb to such an item.
sentences.chinese: 他不会对这样的条款做出让步的。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that you think that something is not good enough or that there is not enough of it

name: letter
trans: n. 信；字母，文字；证书；文学，学问；字面意义

sentences.english: I got a letter from Melanie today.
sentences.chinese: 今天我收到梅拉妮的一封信。

sentences.english: There are 26 letters in the English alphabet.
sentences.chinese: 英语字母表有26个字母。

detailed_translations.english: a written or printed message that is usually put in an envelope and sent by mail

name: exactly
trans: adv. 恰好地；正是；精确地；正确地

sentences.english: It’s exactly half past five.
sentences.chinese: 一分不差，正好5点半。

sentences.english: The figures may not be exactly right, but they’re close enough.
sentences.chinese: 那些数字可能不是非常精确，但也相当接近。

sentences.english: That’s exactly what we’ve been trying to tell you.
sentences.chinese: 那正是我们一直想告诉你的。

detailed_translations.english: used when emphasizing that something is no more and no less than a number or amount, or is completely correct in every detail

sentences.english: First of all, we need to know the facts of the case.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我们需要了解案子的相关事实。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of information that is known to be true

name: sentence
trans: n. [语][计] 句子，命题；宣判，判决

sentences.english: She received an eight-year prison sentence.
sentences.chinese: 她被判八年徒刑。

sentences.english: He has just begun a life sentence for murder.
sentences.chinese: 他犯了谋杀罪，刚开始服无期徒刑。

sentences.english: Sanchez was sentenced to three years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 桑切斯被判了三年监禁。

detailed_translations.english: a punishment that a judge gives to someone who is guilty of a crime
if a judge sentences someone who is guilty of a crime, they give them a punishment

name: quick
trans: adj. 快的；迅速的，敏捷的；灵敏的

sentences.english: That was quick! I thought you’d be another hour.
sentences.chinese: 很快啊！我以为你还要一个小时呢。

sentences.english: It’s probably quicker by train.
sentences.chinese: 乘火车可能会快一点。

sentences.english: Have we got time for a quick drink?
sentences.chinese: 我们有时间喝口东西吗？

sentences.english: What’s the quickest way to the station?
sentences.chinese: 到车站怎么走最快？

sentences.english: We stopped to have a quick look at the church.
sentences.chinese: 我们停下来迅速地扫了一眼教堂。

sentences.english: Three bombs went off in quick succession (= quickly, one after the other ).
sentences.chinese: 瞬间有三个炸弹连续爆炸。

detailed_translations.english: lasting for or taking only a short time

sentences.english: We were foxed by the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们被这个问题难住了。

detailed_translations.english: to confuse or deceive someone in a clever way
a wild animal like a dog with reddish-brown fur, a pointed face, and a thick tail

name: lazy
trans: adj. 懒惰的；懒洋洋的；怠惰的；慢吞吞的

sentences.english: the laziest boy in the class
sentences.chinese: 班上最懒的男孩

sentences.english: He felt too lazy to get out of bed.
sentences.chinese: 他懒得都不想起床。

detailed_translations.english: not liking work and physical activity, or not making any effort to do anything

sentences.english: The paging UI allows you to navigate backwards and forwards through displayed data, displaying a fixed number of records at a time.
sentences.chinese: 该分页 UI 使您能够在所显示的数据之间向前和向后导航，并且一次显示固定数量的记录。

sentences.english: Together they illustrate the importance of understanding the lifecycle -- backwards, forwards, and inside out -- so that you can manipulate it when you need to.

vi. 达到；延伸；伸出手；传开
vt. 达到；影响；抵达；伸出

sentences.chinese: 我们深夜到达伦敦。

detailed_translations.english: the level or amount of something

sentences.chinese: 杰伊脱光衣服奔入海里。

sentences.chinese: 他们并排站着眺望大海。

sentences.chinese: 他借了一个朋友的冲浪板，在日落的时候划入了大海。

sentences.chinese: 希拉里在学校里很受欢迎。

sentences.english: a popular movement for democracy

trans: n. 冲浪运动员，乘冲浪板冲浪的人

detailed_translations.english: in or to every place

sentences.chinese: 你们有卖草莓吗?

name: truth
trans: n. 真理；事实；诚实；实质

sentences.chinese: 我们怎么知道你告诉我们的是真话？

sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼是个好习惯。

trans: n. 健康；卫生；保健；兴旺

sentences.chinese: 我担心我丈夫的健康状况。

sentences.chinese: 即使你没有太多钱，但起码你拥有健康。

sentences.chinese: 老话说得好，人不可貌相。

sentences.chinese: 如果我没记错，他们有三个孩子。

sentences.chinese: 我需要更多信息。

sentences.chinese: 我努力不让自己睡着。

sentences.chinese: 大脑发出的信息是通过中枢神经系统传递的。

sentences.chinese: 不过它也有另一项用途：电子乒乓球。

sentences.chinese: 总统对全国的广播讲话

sentences.english: an independent nation
sentences.chinese: 独立的国家

sentences.chinese: 世界上的主要工业国

sentences.english: the Cherokee nation
sentences.chinese: 切罗基族

sentences.chinese: 猎狮/犀牛/雄鹿等

sentences.chinese: 搜寻失踪儿童

sentences.chinese: 狼往往成群捕猎。

to chase animals and birds in order to kill or catch them

trans: vt. 度过，消磨（时光）；花费；浪费；用尽

sentences.chinese: 这星期我没有能力花更多的钱了。

sentences.chinese: 修理费很高，但这是该花的钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 度过，消磨（时光）；花费；浪费；用尽

trans: adj. 自然的；物质的；天生的；不做作的
n. 自然的事情；白痴；本位音

sentences.english: the study of the natural world
sentences.chinese: 对自然界的研究

sentences.english: an area of spectacular natural beauty
sentences.chinese: 自然风景秀丽的地区

sentences.english: death from natural causes
sentences.chinese: 自然死亡

sentences.chinese: 办公室里需要自然光的照射

detailed_translations.english: existing in nature and not caused, made, or controlled by people

sentences.chinese: 一盒婴儿学步的录像带

sentences.chinese: 他走了一步就跌倒了。

sentences.chinese: 我来回走了几次才找到那家商店。

sentences.chinese: 这是福利制度改革的第一步。

sentences.chinese: 珍妮坐在房前的台阶上等着。

sentences.chinese: 我不小心踩进了水坑。

sentences.chinese: 募集到的钱款将用于修缮教堂屋顶。

sentences.chinese: 硬毛刷，板刷

sentences.chinese: 糖对牙齿不好。

trans: adj. 有组织的；安排有秩序的；做事有条理的

sentences.chinese: 太乱了！

sentences.chinese: 对不起——这里有些乱。

sentences.chinese: 我回到家时，屋子里一片狼藉。

sentences.english: You can make cookies if you promise not to make a mess in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 如果你答应不把厨房搞得乱七八糟，你可以去做甜饼。

sentences.chinese: 她讨厌到处乱糟糟的。

detailed_translations.english: to make something look untidy or dirty

name: develop

sentences.chinese: 遗传学领域的知识发展非常迅速。

sentences.chinese: 科西嘉岛的经济是围绕旅游业发展起来的。

sentences.chinese: 锻炼肌肉力量的运动

sentences.chinese: 他对我产生了一些好感。

sentences.chinese: 这块土地被开发建造廉价住宅。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually grow or become bigger, more advanced, stronger, etc.; to make sth do this

adj. 最终的；决定性的；不可更改的

sentences.english: The final episode will be shown tonight.
sentences.chinese: 最后一集将于今晚播出。

sentences.english: students preparing for their final examinations
sentences.chinese: 正在准备期末考试的学生

sentences.english: Stone is filming the final instalment of his Vietnam trilogy.
sentences.chinese: 斯通正在拍摄越战三部曲的最后一部。

sentences.english: the final stages in their relationship
sentences.chinese: 他们之间关系的最后阶段

sentences.english: They scored in the final minutes of the game.
sentences.chinese: 他们在比赛的最后几分钟得分。

sentences.english: We can advise the client, but in the end it is he who has the final say.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以提出建议，但是最终的决定权还是在客户自己手里。

detailed_translations.english: last in a series of actions, events, parts of a story etc

sentences.english: At the end of each level, there’s an exam.
sentences.chinese: 在每一级别结束时都有一次考试。

sentences.english: How did you do in your exams?
sentences.chinese: 你考试考得怎么样？

sentences.english: an eye exam
sentences.chinese: 眼睛检查

detailed_translations.english: a spoken or written test of knowledge, especially an important one

sentences.english: She excels all of us at tennis.
sentences.chinese: 她的网球比我们打得都好。

sentences.english: I like his smile and his tennis!
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢他的微笑和他的网球！

sentences.english: If she decides to go with her sister instead, then I can play tennis with you.
sentences.chinese: 要是她决定和她姐姐一起出去，那我就能和你去打网球。

detailed_translations.english: a game for two people or two pairs of people who use  rackets  to hit a small soft ball backwards and forwards over a net

name: rights
trans: n. [法] 权利；权限；认股权

name: care
trans: n. 关怀；照料；谨慎；忧虑
vi. 照顾；关心；喜爱；顾虑

sentences.english: ‘He looked angry.’ ‘ I don’t care !’
sentences.chinese: “他好像很生气。”“我不管！”

sentences.english: She felt that nobody cared.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得没有人在乎。

sentences.english: The picture had been drawn with great care.
sentences.chinese: 这幅图画得非常用心。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is important, so that you are interested in it, worried about it etc
when you are careful to avoid damage, mistakes etc

name: pet
trans: n. 宠物；生气；受宠爱的人

sentences.english: They have two pets – a cat and a dog.
sentences.chinese: 他们有两只宠物，一只猫和一只狗。

sentences.english: We weren’t allowed to keep pets at school.
sentences.chinese: 学校里不许我们养宠物。

sentences.english: Rabbits make good pets .
sentences.chinese: 兔子是很好的宠物。

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["pet food"]}
sentences.chinese: 宠物粮食

sentences.english: a pet shop
sentences.chinese: 宠物商店

sentences.english: The policeman reached down and petted the wolfhound.
sentences.chinese: 警察伸出手，摸了摸那条猎狼犬。

detailed_translations.english: an animal such as a cat or a dog which you keep and care for at home
If you pet a person or animal, you touch them in an affectionate way
a plan, idea, or subject that you particularly like or are interested in

sentences.english: a six-month-old puppy
sentences.chinese: 一只六个月大的小狗

sentences.english: a seal puppy
sentences.chinese: 一只小海豹

detailed_translations.english: a young dog

name: rocket
trans: vi. 飞驰，飞快地移动；迅速增加

sentences.english: The rocket was launched from a space research base.
sentences.chinese: 火箭从一个太空研究基地发射升空。

sentences.english: a space rocket
sentences.chinese: 航天火箭

sentences.english: Interest rates rocketed up.
sentences.chinese: 利率飞涨。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle used for travelling or carrying things into space, which is shaped like a big tube
if a price or amount rockets, it increases quickly and suddenly

name: alone
trans: adj. 独自的；单独的；孤独的

sentences.english: She lives alone.
sentences.chinese: 她一个人生活。

sentences.english: You shouldn’t leave a child alone in the house.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该把小孩独自留在家里。

sentences.english: My wife and I like to spend time alone together away from the kids.
sentences.chinese: 我和妻子喜欢没有孩子打扰，过二人世界。

sentences.english: She has lived alone in this house for almost five years now.
sentences.chinese: 她现在已经独自在这所房子里住了差不多五年了。

detailed_translations.english: if you are alone in a place, there is no one with you
without any help from other people

name: field
trans: n. 领域；牧场；旷野；战场；运动场
adj. 扫描场；田赛的；野生的
vt. 把暴晒于场上；使上场

sentences.english: a view of green fields and rolling hills
sentences.chinese: 田野青翠、丘陵起伏的景色

sentences.english: Fans cheered as the players took the field (= went onto the field ) .
sentences.chinese: 球员上场时球迷们欢呼起来。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land in the country, especially one where crops are grown or animals feed on grass

sentences.english: Luckily the museum was not damaged by the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 幸好，博物馆没有在地震中遭到破坏。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that it is good that something happened or was done because if it had not, the situation would be unpleasant or difficult

sentences.english: Yes, I like basketball and baseball.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我喜欢篮球和棒球。

sentences.english: Do you like baseball?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢打棒球吗?。

sentences.english: That man over there used to be one of the best players in baseball .
sentences.chinese: 这句话的意思是：那边那个人以前是最好的棒球运动员之一。

detailed_translations.english: an outdoor game between two teams of nine players, in which players try to get points by hitting a ball and running around four  base s

name: snack
trans: n. 小吃，快餐；一份，部分

sentences.english: I grabbed a quick snack.
sentences.chinese: 我赶紧吃了点零食。

sentences.english: Drinks and light snacks are served at the bar.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧里供应饮料和小吃。

sentences.english: snack foods like crisps and peanuts
sentences.chinese: 炸薯片和花生之类的小吃

detailed_translations.english: a small amount of food that is eaten between main meals or instead of a meal

name: pop
trans: abbr. 卖点广告（Point of Purchase）

sentences.english: The window opened and a dog's head popped out.
sentences.chinese: 窗子打开了，冷不防一只狗探出头来。

sentences.english: An idea suddenly popped into his head.
sentences.chinese: 他突然想到了一个主意。

detailed_translations.english: to suddenly appear, especially when not expected

name: if
trans: conj. （表条件）如果；即使；是否；（表假设）假如

sentences.english: We’ll stay at home if it rains.
sentences.chinese: 如果下雨，我们就待在家里。

sentences.english: If you need money, I can lend you some.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要钱，我能借给你一些。

sentences.english: If I didn’t apologize, I’d feel guilty.
sentences.chinese: 如果我不道歉，我会感到内疚。

sentences.english: If you had worked harder, you would have passed your exams.
sentences.chinese: 要是你再努力一点，就通过考试了。

sentences.english: What would happen to your family if you were to die in an accident?
sentences.chinese: 要是你在意外事故中身亡，你的家人会怎么样呢？

sentences.english: If Dad were here, he would know what to do.
sentences.chinese: 如果爸爸在这儿，他会知道怎么做的。

sentences.english: Taste the soup and add salt and pepper if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 尝一下汤，需要的话加一点盐和胡椒粉。

sentences.english: I want to get back by five o’clock if possible.
sentences.chinese: 如果可能的话，我想5点之前回来。

sentences.english: I think I can fix it tomorrow. If not, you’ll have to wait till Friday.
sentences.chinese: 我想明天我能修好它，如果不行，你只好等到周五了。

sentences.english: Is the book available, and if so, where?
sentences.chinese: 有没有这本书？ 如果有的话，在哪儿？

sentences.english: The missiles can be fired only if the operator types in a six-digit code.
sentences.chinese: 只有在操作员输入一组六位数密码后，导弹才能发射。

sentences.english: We’ll face that problem if and when it comes along (= if it happens or when it happens ).
sentences.chinese: 如果这一问题真的发生了，我们就要面对它。

sentences.english: If by any chance you can’t manage dinner tonight, perhaps we can at least have a drink together.
sentences.chinese: 万一你今晚不能来吃饭，或许我们至少可以一起喝一杯。

detailed_translations.english: used when talking about something that might happen or be true, or might have happened

sentences.english: Nothing ever seems to upset him.
sentences.chinese: 似乎从来没有什么事情会使他烦恼。

sentences.english: Have you ever been to Paris?
sentences.chinese: 你去过巴黎吗？

sentences.english: I don’t think I’ve ever been here before.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我以前从未到过这里。

sentences.english: It was raining harder than ever.
sentences.chinese: 当时下着前所未有的大雨。

detailed_translations.english: used in negative sentences and questions, or sentences with if to mean ‘at any time’

name: root
trans: vt. 生根，固定；根源在于

sentences.english: tree roots
sentences.chinese: 树根

sentences.english: These plants produce a number of thin roots.
sentences.chinese: 这些植物会长出一些细根。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a plant or tree that grows under the ground and gets water from the soil
to grow roots

name: toot
trans: vt. 吹奏出；使发嘟嘟声

name: shame
trans: n. 羞耻，羞愧；憾事，带来耻辱的人

sentences.english: He felt a deep sense of shame.
sentences.chinese: 他深深地感到羞愧。

sentences.english: Maria blushed with shame.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚羞得脸都红了。

sentences.english: (= it made her feel ashamed ) , she gained back all the weight she’d lost.
sentences.chinese: 让她感到惭愧的是，她减掉的体重全又长回来了。

sentences.english: He’s brought shame on the whole family.
sentences.chinese: 他使全家蒙羞。

sentences.english: (= it should not make you feel ashamed ) saying ‘I don’t know’.
sentences.chinese: 说一句"我不知道”也没什么可难为情的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 羞耻，羞愧；憾事，带来耻辱的人
detailed_translations.english: the feeling you have when you feel guilty and embarrassed because you, or someone who is close to you, have done something wrong
to make someone feel ashamed

sentences.english: We met at 12 noon.
sentences.chinese: 我们中午12点见了面。

detailed_translations.english: 12 o’clock in the daytime

name: hamburger
trans: n. 汉堡包，火腿汉堡；牛肉饼，肉饼；碎牛肉

sentences.english: A hamburger and a coke.
sentences.chinese: 一个汉堡和一杯可乐。

sentences.english: Then have a hamburger.
sentences.chinese: 那么吃一个汉堡吧。

sentences.english: I order a soda and a hamburger for myself. Then another person gets coffee for me.
sentences.chinese: 嗯， 我为自己点了一杯苏打和一个汉堡包， 然后另外一人给我拿了杯咖啡。

detailed_translations.english: a flat round piece of finely cut beef(= meat from a cow ) which is cooked and eaten in a bread bun

name: nature
trans: n. 自然；性质；本性；种类

sentences.english: We grew up in the countryside, surrounded by the beauties of nature.
sentences.chinese: 我们在乡村长大，周围是美丽的大自然。

sentences.english: nature conservation
sentences.chinese: 自然保护

sentences.english: Disease is nature’s way of keeping the population down.
sentences.chinese: 疾病是大自然控制人口的方法。

sentences.english: I tried appealing to his better nature (= his feelings of kindness ) but he wouldn’t agree to help us.
sentences.chinese: 我想唤起他的善良本性，但他就是不同意帮助我们。

sentences.english: Capitalist society is by its very nature unstable.
sentences.chinese: 从本质而言，资本主义社会是不稳定的。

detailed_translations.english: everything in the physical world that is not controlled by humans, such as wild plants and animals, earth and rocks, and the weather

name: wish
trans: vt. 祝愿；渴望；向…致问候语

sentences.english: Close your eyes and make a wish.
sentences.chinese: 闭上眼睛许个愿。

detailed_translations.english: a desire to do something, to have something, or to have something happen
to want something to be true although you know it is either impossible or unlikely

sentences.english: Germany borders on France.
sentences.chinese: 德国与法国接壤。

sentences.english: Bismarck ruled Germany by a strong hand.
sentences.chinese: 俾斯麦用铁腕手段统治德国。

sentences.english: The new Nazism is resurging in some places in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 新纳粹主义正在德国的一些地方复活。

name: university
trans: n. 大学；综合性大学；大学校舍

sentences.english: He teaches Esperanto at that university.
sentences.chinese: 他在那所大学教世界语。

sentences.english: She buddied up with a student from another university.
sentences.chinese: 她与来自另一大学的一名学生交朋友。

sentences.english: The student left the university to go out into the world and find himself.
sentences.chinese: 这个学生离开了大学进入社会去发现自己的才能所在。

detailed_translations.english: an educational institution at the highest level, where you study for a degree

name: organize
trans: vt. 组织；使有系统化；给予生机；组织成立工会等
vi. 组织起来；成立组织

sentences.english: The course was organized by a training company.
sentences.chinese: 这一课程是由一家培训公司组织的。

sentences.english: Students need to learn how to organize their work.
sentences.chinese: 学生要学会如何安排好自己的学习。

sentences.english: We are learning about how genes are organized.
sentences.chinese: 我们在了解基因是如何排列的。

detailed_translations.english: to make the necessary arrangements so that an activity can happen effectively

sentences.english: Let’s go back to camp – it’s getting dark.
sentences.chinese: 我们回营地吧，天快黑了。

sentences.english: a camp near Lake Ellen Wilson
sentences.chinese: 埃伦•威尔逊湖边的营地

sentences.english: The soldiers broke camp (= took down their tents etc ) and left before dawn.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们在黎明前拔营出发了。

sentences.english: We set up camp (= made the camping place ready ) at nearby Icicle Lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们在附近的冰柱湖边建了营地。

sentences.english: The expedition’s base camp (= main camp ) was 6,000 feet below the summit.
sentences.chinese: 探险队的大本营在山峰下面6,000英尺处。

detailed_translations.english: a place where people stay in tents, shelters etc for a short time, usually in the mountains, a forest etc
to set up a tent or shelter and stay there for a short time

sentences.english: As a kid he’d never share his toys.
sentences.chinese: 他小时候从不肯与人分享他的玩具。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone have or use something that belongs to you
one of the equal parts into which the  ownership  of a company is divided

name: guess what
trans: 猜猜看；你猜怎么着；猜怎么了

name: learn about
trans: v. 得知关于；学习关于

name: How far is it from ... to ...?
No photos!
trans: 请勿拍照；禁止拍照；严禁拍照

sentences.english: Take it outside, go for a walk or eat at your desk.
sentences.chinese: 那就打包带走，边散步边吃，或者在办公桌上吃。

sentences.english: Don't like eating in the lunch room? Take it outside, go for a walk or eat at your desk.
sentences.chinese: 不喜欢在餐厅吃午餐吗？那就打包带走，边散步边吃，或者在办公桌上吃。

sentences.english: I try to do something, however little, try to make the effort to wash and dress and go for a walk every day, which helps me to feel in control of my life.
sentences.chinese: 我会尽力去做一些事情，尽管很微小，我会努力每天去洗漱更衣并且出去散步，这可以帮助我感觉到我还能够控制我的生活。

name: fall off
trans: na. 下降；(从马上)掉下来；扫兴颓丧；离开

sentences.english: When your exhaust pipe falls off, you have to replace it.
sentences.chinese: 当你的排气管脱落时，你只能更换它。

detailed_translations.english: If something falls off, it separates from the thing to which it was attached and moves toward the ground

name: all right
trans: adj. 可接受（的）；满意（的）；安全健康（的）；平安无恙（的）
int. 是不是；（表示同意）好；没什么；（引起注意）哎

name: a few
trans: na. 几个；〔反语〕很多；〈俚〉一点点

sentences.english: The committee disinterred a few old studies done by the predecessors to prove their point.
sentences.chinese: 该委员会再现了由前任作的一些旧研究以证明他们的观点。

sentences.english: They compiled thousands of case history to prove the relationship between smoking and cancer.
sentences.chinese: 他们收集了数以千计的病历来证明吸烟与癌症的关系。

sentences.english: There are thousands of things I want to do.
sentences.chinese: 我有很多事情想做。

detailed_translations.chinese: 数以千计的，许许多多的

name: work on
trans: na. 对…有效[有作用]；动(人,感情等)；向…做工作；左右

name: be new to
trans: 对……陌生；对……不习惯；不熟悉

sentences.english: However, it is found in the study of mountain tourist hotel , the important matter in hotel design is try one's best to saving fund in build hotel and obtain maximal economy advantage.
sentences.chinese: 然而在对以往建成山地旅游宾馆的研究中发现，尽量的节约建设宾馆的投入资金，并促使宾馆在经营中获得最大的经济利益成为了宾馆设计所重视的问题。

name: Well done.
trans: adj. 熟透的；煮透了的；烧烂了的

name: make ... from ...
trans: na. 用…做材料[样子]制造

name: think about
trans: un. 思考；探讨；为…费心思；想像

sentences.english: We can think about why that would be.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以考虑一下为什么会是那样。

name: play music
trans: 奏乐；播放音乐；演奏音乐

name: I hope so.
trans: 我希望如此；但愿如此；我希望是这样

sentences.english: Subjects or participants - Who will take part in your study ?
sentences.chinese: 研究对象或参与者――谁将会参与你的研究？

sentences.english: Students should do surveys, visit museums, take part in charity work and hand in reports for teachers to decide on their marks.
sentences.chinese: 学生应该通过做调查，参观博物馆，参加公益劳动，上交给老师的这些活动的报告，决定他们的成绩。

sentences.english: Synchronous serve and asynchronous receive can be particularly useful in cases where external clients take part in application processing by sending messages to the application.
sentences.chinese: 如果外部客户端通过向应用程序发送消息来参与应用程序处理，同步服务和异步接收将尤为有用。

detailed_translations.english: to be involved in sth

name: get back
trans: na. 取回；回来；送回；〈俚〉报复

sentences.english: A number of records fell during the sports meet.
sentences.chinese: 在运动会上破了多项记录。

sentences.english: The success of the sports meet turns on the weather.
sentences.chinese: 运动会能否成功要看天气如何。

sentences.english: Whether it rains or not, we’ll hold the sports meet.
sentences.chinese: 不管下不下雨，我们都将举行运动会。

name: twice a week
trans: 一周两次；每周两次；一星期两次

sentences.english: The high jump is a masochist's event - it always ends in failure.
sentences.chinese: 跳高运动是受虐者的项目——它总是以失败告终。

sentences.english: Over the course of those eight years, the quiet, sporty brunette, famous at school for her record-breaking high jump and tenacious character, earned the humiliating nickname of Waity Katie.
sentences.chinese: 在过去的八年中，这位性格沉静、肤色浅黑的运动型女人曾在学校跳高比赛中以坚韧的性格打破记录而闻名，从而赢得了一个雅号“趣味凯蒂”。

sentences.english: Yes，I got the second place for the high jump in the univer-sity spots meet in 1994.
sentences.chinese: 有，我于1994年获校运动会跳高比赛第二名。

detailed_translations.english: a sports event in which someone runs and jumps over a bar that is raised higher each time they jump

name: on one's own
trans: na. 独自地；独立地；凭自己力量；主动地

sentences.english: To Americans,being on one's own suggests that one is a fully independent and functioning part of the whole capable and willing to make choices.
sentences.chinese: 译文 对美国人而言，依靠自己的力量就是指这个人作为整体的一部分是完全独立并能起作用的，他有能力也愿意做出选择。

name: make a difference
trans: na. 发生差别；使…有差别；(结果等)是重要的

sentences.english: Whatever she did, it made no difference. ＃
sentences.chinese: 不管她做什么都没有用。

detailed_translations.english: to have an important effect or influence on something or someone

name: give up
trans: na. 放弃；断绝；投降；自首

sentences.english: The Coast Guard had given up all hope of finding the two divers alive.
sentences.chinese: 海岸警卫队已放弃了两名潜水员生还的全部希望。

detailed_translations.english: If you give up something, you stop doing it or having it

sentences.english: What do you think should be expected in the future?
sentences.chinese: 你认为什么会是在将来可以期待的？

sentences.english: I have high hopes for what the initiative – and all of us – can do together in the future.
sentences.chinese: 我对这个项目，对所有人都寄予厚望，我们在未来可以携手合作，共同面对。

name: come up with
trans: na. 想出(一个主意或计划)；提出；提供；筹措

sentences.english: You would take things as they came. All you had to do was think a little harder and come up with a new solution.
sentences.chinese: 既来之, 则安之， 你必须多动脑子， 想出个新的解决方法来。

sentences.english: I come up with half of my blog post ideas while I am cooking (the other half I get while running) so you can use cooking to come up with new ideas for your life.
sentences.chinese: 当我烹饪时我想出了一半的博客日志（另一半跑步时就想出来了）所以你可以用烹饪为你的生活想出一些好的想法。

name: win first prize
trans: 获一等奖；赢得头奖；获得一等奖

name: different kinds of
trans: 不同种类的；各种各样的；各种不同类型的

name: come over
trans: na. 渡过来；(从敌方)过来；变挂；〔口语〕欺骗

name: do well in ...
trans: 擅长；在……方面做得好；在……干得好

sentences.english: Now I can go anywhere and make friends and find family.
sentences.chinese: 现在我可以去任何地方，结交朋友，寻找家人。

sentences.english: Everyone needs friends, and if you fail to make friends, you should examine yourself and see if there is something wrong with your personality.
sentences.chinese: 人人都需要朋友，若你在交朋友方面总是失败，就该反省自己，看是否你的个性有什么问题。

name: at the same time
trans: na. 同时；另一方面；与此同时

sentences.english: You can do anything you want, but not everything at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 你可以完成你想要做的任何事，但你不可能同时完成所有的事。

sentences.english: But men process and express emotions differently than women, and they have no roadmap for how to combine the masculine requirement of being strong and emotional at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 但是，比起女人，男人处理和表达情感的方式很不同，他们对如何将男性对强壮和感情的的需求同时结合起来没有一个规划图。

sentences.english: How do we escape the stereotypes and yet fulfill them at the same time?
sentences.chinese: 我们如何才能跳出这一老套的模式，并同时能好好的完成它们？

name: enjoy doing ...
trans: 喜欢做某事；享受做某事的乐趣；喜爱做某事

name: stay in shape
trans: 保持体型；保持体形；保持身材

name: add up ...
trans: na. 合计；符合预期的数目

name: play an instrument
trans: 演奏乐器；弹一种乐器；弹奏一种乐器

name: go on a trip
trans: 去旅行；进行旅行；去旅游

sentences.english: After boating, they go to have lunch nearby.
sentences.chinese: 划过船以后，他们到附近去吃午饭。

sentences.english: "Where do you want to have lunch?, " I asked.
sentences.chinese: 我问她：“你想去哪里吃午饭啊？”

sentences.english: I have lunch at a restaurant with my colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 我跟同事一块儿在一家餐馆吃午饭。

name: in a hurry to do ...
trans: 匆忙去做某事；急忙做某事；匆忙着

name: surf the Internet
trans: 上网；网上冲浪；上网冲浪

name: have a good weekend
trans: 周末愉快；祝周末过得愉快；祝你周末过得愉快

name: take a bus
trans: 乘公共汽车；坐公共汽车；乘公交车

sentences.english: I know the mayor really well. In fact, I had dinner with her last week.
sentences.chinese: 我跟市长很熟，事实上，我上周还和她一起吃过饭呢。

detailed_translations.english: used when you are adding something, especially something surprising, to emphasize what you have just said

name: dig in
trans: na. 挖进；戳进；苦学；坚持主张

name: look up
trans: v. 查找；查阅；探望；看望

sentences.english: I looked your address up in the personnel file.
sentences.chinese: 我从人事档案里查到了你的地址。

detailed_translations.english: If you look up a fact or a piece of information, you find it out by looking in something such as a reference book or a list

sentences.english: The business of life is to enjoy oneself.
sentences.chinese: 生活的内容就是快快乐乐地过日子。

sentences.english: I want you be pround of me. I hope you enjoy oneself.
sentences.chinese: 我想让您因我而自豪。我希望你能过得快乐！

sentences.english: That, I believe, is what God asks of us --- not “Be perfect”, not “Don’t even make a mistake”, but “Be whole”.
sentences.chinese: 我相信这就是上帝对我们的期望：不求“完美”，也不求“从来不犯错误”，而是追求人生的“完整”。

sentences.english: Now, you think you can make a mistake on your exam, take a look at this up here at tell me what that all is. I have no idea.
sentences.chinese: 你觉得你可以在考试的时候犯错误，看一看这之前写的东西,能告诉我这些是什么，我也不知道。

sentences.english: When you do make a mistake, think about all of the possible solutions, so that when you tell someone, you can suggest ways to fix it.
sentences.chinese: 如果真的犯了错误，想一想可能的解决方法，这样你在跟别人说的时候就可以提出解决它的建议。

name: laugh at
trans: na. 嘲笑；付之一笑；因…而发笑

sentences.english: I didn't ask for the chairmanship. I was pitched into it.
sentences.chinese: 我并不要求主席职位，我是被迫接受的。

sentences.english: What we expressed to them is that we know they did not ask for this.
sentences.chinese: 我们向他们表明的就是我们知道他们不要对这件事有什么刻意要求。

name: help ... do
trans: 帮助做某事；帮助干某事；帮忙做

name: help ... to do
trans: 帮助做某事；帮忙做某事；有助于做某事

name: try to do ...
trans: 尽力做某事；努力做某事；试着做某事

name: wake up
trans: na. 同“wake”；叫醒；醒来；振作起来

sentences.english: You can go to bed with one view and wake up with another.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在一种景色相伴下入眠，而醒来看到的是另一种景色。

sentences.english: Maybe you’re dreaming me; maybe we only exist in each other’s dreams and every morning when we wake up we forget all about each other.
sentences.chinese: 也许是你梦到了我；也许我们只存在于对方的梦里，每天早晨当我们醒来时我们就忘了和对方有关的一切。

sentences.english: I often go swimming on weekday.
sentences.chinese: 我经常在周日去游泳。

sentences.english: Where do you go swimming?
sentences.chinese: 你们去哪里游泳呢？

sentences.english: Your grandparents go swimming every day?
sentences.chinese: 你祖父母每天去游泳吗？

sentences.english: Where do I wait for the express to Edinburgh?
sentences.chinese: 我到哪里等候开往爱丁堡的快车呢？

name: do some research
trans: 做研究；做些研究；做调查

name: get ... together
trans: na. 聚集；集合；汇齐；积累

name: It is a great season for ...
play catch
trans: 少爷威威；作传球的游戏；玩投接球

name: have a picnic
trans: 举行野餐；去野餐；吃野餐

name: to tell you the truth
trans: 说实话；实话告诉你；说老实话

sentences.english: To tell the truth, I fell asleep in the middle of her talk.
sentences.chinese: 说实话，我在她讲话过程中睡着了。

detailed_translations.english: used when admitting sth

sentences.english: I found her on the seashore,dreaming away as usual.
sentences.chinese: 我在海滨找到了她，像往常一样她又在那儿发呆。

sentences.english: Taxpayers are grumbling about the waste of government money,as usual.
sentences.chinese: 纳税人又像往常一样抱怨政府浪费钱财。

sentences.english: I find him in the garden, dreaming away as usual.
sentences.chinese: 我发现他又像往常一样，在花园里失了神。

detailed_translations.english: in the same way as what happens most of the time or in most cases

name: stay healthy
trans: 保持健康；保持身体健康；健康保持

name: used to
trans: modalv. （用于过去持续或经常发生的事）曾经

sentences.english: He used to go to our school.
sentences.chinese: 他曾在我们学校就读。

sentences.english: We’re eating out more often than we used to.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在出去吃饭的次数比以前多了。

detailed_translations.english: if something used to happen, it happened regularly or all the time in the past, but does not happen now

name: worry about ...
trans: v. 发愁；担忧；为…发愁；替…担忧

name: put on weight
trans: v. 长肉；发胖；发福；体重增加

sentences.english: I had put on weight after having our daughter, so felt incredibly worthless.
sentences.chinese: 生完女儿后我的体重增加，产生了难以置信的自卑感。

sentences.english: Many over-40s begin to eat too much, put on weight and cut down on the amount of daily exercise they take, according to a new study.
sentences.chinese: 根据一项新研究，许多人一过40岁就开始过度饮食，体重增加，减少每日的运动量。

sentences.english: In any case, people should not put on weight in hopes of preventing glaucoma, Kishor said. “Don’t gain weight thinking that it might somehow protect you, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: 不论如何，人们都不应该抱着一种预防青光眼的希望来增肥，基肖尔说，“千万不要在体重增加的同时心想这么做可能会保护你自己”。

name: couch potato
trans: n. 老泡在电视机前的人

name: get out
trans: na. 摆脱；走出；〔命令语气〕出去!

name: in the sun
trans: na. 在阳光下；〔美国〕喝醉

sentences.english: Thus, relatively speaking, sleeping on one's side is preferable. It can avoid the pessimistic circumstances above.
sentences.chinese: 因此，比较而言，侧卧是比较好的姿势，可以避免上述情况发生。

sentences.english: Sleeping on one's side with legs outstretched and arms down in what Idzikowski refers to as the log, indicates a social, easy-going personality.
sentences.chinese: 侧睡并双腿张开、双臂自然垂下，这种被克里斯教授称为原木的睡姿表明一个人的性格是交际型、比较随和的。

name: go fishing
trans: 去钓鱼；垂钓；我以前常去钓鱼

name: First Nations
trans: n. 土著居民（不包括因纽特人或米提人）

sentences.english: If you added any text at that time, you should see it now.
sentences.chinese: 如果您在那时添加了任何文本，那么现在就会看到这些文本。

sentences.english: So when I do ask him to come with me to something at that time, he happily does.
sentences.chinese: 所以当我需要他在那时去做一些事情的时候，他都会很高兴地答应。

name: get up
trans: na. 起床；起身；站起来；叫…起床

sentences.english: I got up and walked over to where he was.
sentences.chinese: 我站起来，走到他那里。

sentences.english: They have to get up early in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 他们一大早就得起床。

detailed_translations.english: When someone who is sitting or lying down gets up, they rise to a standing position

name: take an exam
trans: 参加考试；应试；进行考试

name: play basketball
trans: 打篮球；玩篮球；篮球锻炼知多少

sentences.english: I play basketball every week with friends.
sentences.chinese: 我每周都和朋友打篮球。

sentences.english: In the afternoon, we play basketball or tennis.
sentences.chinese: 下午时，我们打篮球或者网球。

sentences.english: I used to go play basketball with some of my friends every Saturday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 以前我和一些朋友每星期六下午都去打篮球.

name: play volleyball
trans: 打排球；玩排球；排球比赛

sentences.english: I always used to laugh to myself when I heard people say that we need to take care of ourselves in order to be able to take care of others.
sentences.chinese: 我听到一些人说要照顾好我们自己，这样我们才有能力去照顾好别人。 不知道为什么，当我听到这句话的时候，我经常笑我自己。

sentences.english: Because the office refrigerator is unowned by any individual, no one feels responsibility to take care of it, and certainly no one wants to take time out of his or her busy workday to do so.
sentences.chinese: 办公室里的冰箱因为不属于任何一个个人，没有人觉得自己有责任去管理或者照顾它，当然也没人在繁忙的工作时间抽出时间去做那些事情。

name: move away
trans: 离开; 搬到别处去住; 改变（见解）; 挪开

sentences.english: Malia and Sasha may live in the White Housethese days, but Michelle and I still make sure they finish their schoolwork, dotheir chores, and walk the dog.
sentences.chinese: 我的两个女儿这些日子住在白宫，但是米歇尔和我仍然要督促她们完成家庭作业和做一些力所能及的家务，同时还要负责遛狗。

sentences.english: She's worn shorts before — to walk the dog, do stuff around the White House.
sentences.chinese: 以前在遛狗或白宫附近工作时，她也穿短裤。

name: take ... out
trans: na. 取出；带出(散步等)；除去(污点等)；取得(专卖权等)

name: keep doing ...
trans: 继续做；坚持做某事；一直做某事

name: share ... with ...
trans: un. 合伙；合住；承担；跟…看法一致
